title: Heating Control
label: Heating
text:
The heating is controlled from the thermostat located in the living room, just to the left of the bedroom door. It has two dials: the top one turns the heating on or off, and the bottom one allows you to adjust the temperature. The recommended temperature is 22¬∫C and is indicated by the dot on the lower regulator.

The top switch has three possible positions:

 - Left (Moon Icon): Heating OFF.

 - Center (Sun Icon): Heating ON. The desired temperature is regulated using the lower dial.

 - Right (Clock Icon): Used to program the heating. If you wish to program it, please let us know and we will be happy to help you.
